name.baseName: Electricity production ; Electricity ; Thermal power (71.2%) + hydropower (2.1%) + nuclear power (15.8%) + wind power (8.8%) + solar power (2.0%)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Forms of electricity generation include thermal power generation, hydropower generation, nuclear power generation, wind power generation and solar power generation.
电力产生形式包括火力发电、水力发电、核能发电、风力发电和太阳能发电

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Calculated based on data from the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook
根据2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the processes of electricity production involving thermal power, hydropower, nuclear power, wind power, and solar power generation. The electricity mix composed of 71.2% thermal power, 2.1% hydropower, 15.8% nuclear power, 8.8% wind power, and 2.0% solar power is used for residential, commercial, industrial purposes, and as supply power for various infrastructures.
该数据集代表了包括火力发电、水力发电、核能发电、风力发电和太阳能发电在内的电力生产过程。电力组合由71.2%的火力发电、2.1%的水力发电、15.8%的核能发电、8.8%的风力发电和2.0%的太阳能发电组成，用于居民生活、商业、工业用途以及作为各种基础设施的供电。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the accounting method, please refer to the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities". Different forms of power generation and fuel consumption come from Chapter 3 (Energy Production) and Chapter 6 (Regional Energy Balance Sheet) in the "China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020". The fuel parameters such as low calorific value and carbon content per unit calorific value used to calculate the carbon dioxide emission factor come from the "2019 China Regional Power Grid Carbon Dioxide Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM" and the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emission Accounting Method and Reporting Guide for Power Generation Facilities" 》
核算方法参考《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》。不同形式发电量及燃料用量来自于《中国能源统计年鉴 2020》中的第三章（能源生产） 和第六章（地区能源平衡表）。用于计算二氧化碳排放因子的低位发热量、单位热值含碳量等燃料参数来自于《2019 年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子 OM 计算说明》、《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).
熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should refer to the 'Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities' and the 'China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020' for methodological details regarding power generation and fuel consumption statistics. The CO2 emission factors are pertinent for the inclusion in life cycle assessments and should take into account the regional variations and technological specifications provided by the '2019 China Regional Power Grid Carbon Dioxide Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM'. When using this data for modeling, it is crucial to accurately represent the mix of electricity generation sources and to ensure that CO2 emissions are calculated based on the specific energy consumption and emissions data provided.
使用此数据集的用户应参考《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》和《中国能源统计年鉴 2020》中有关发电和燃料消耗统计的方法学细节。二氧化碳排放因子对于生命周期评估的纳入至关重要，应考虑《2019年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子OM计算说明》提供的地区差异和技术规范。在使用此数据进行建模时，准确表示电力生成来源的组合非常关键，并确保基于提供的具体能耗和排放数据计算CO2排放。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
